column4: hi, i haven't upgraded in awhile; when i try to use update-manager, it tells me that us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/feisty/main/binary-amd64/Packages.gz cannot be reached, etc
back up your important files and use an alternate-install cd to upgrade
is there no way to just tell it a more recent repo?
well, you kinda will end up with a frankenstein pc if you get what I mean ;)
